thread.title: Monday Blues: Power couple Jay Z, Beyonce still crazy in love
thread.title_full: Monday Blues: Power couple Jay Z, Beyonce still crazy in love

title: Monday Blues: Power couple Jay Z, Beyonce still crazy in love
text:
By Stevens Muendo Monday, Oct 12th 2015 at 11:34 
It seems like they only just got back from a lavish Mediterranean yachting vacation, writes Mail Online. 
But Beyonce, 34, and Jay Z, 45, must’ve felt they needed a little more relaxation, as they posted several photos showing them together on what looked to be another boat on Saturday, the online site posted yesterday. 
In the past, they’ve been more subtle with their affection towards each other, but lately they’ve been publicly showing their love with increasing frequency. 
The first shot, a closeup, depicts both Jay Z and Beyonce behind pairs of shades, with Jay Z pecking his wife on the side of the face. 
Later, two more pictures were posted, but they were individual portraits. 
In one gorgeous snap, a very youthful-looking Beyonce is seated on a bench in front of part of the boat’s windshield. 
Her luscious blonde locks flailed in the wind as the pop superstar seductively squinted into the camera. 
It appears that she was only wearing a swimsuit, a floral cover up and a loose fabric headband. Jay Z also got creative, starring in his own photo which showed the rap mogul bathed in sunlight and smoking a cigar in front of the dimming horizon.
